name: Button.Root

builders.description: An array of melt builders to be applied to the button.
builders.description_zh: 要应用于按钮的熔体生成器数组。

href.description: An optional prop that when passed converts the button into an anchor tag.
href.description_zh: 一个可选的道具，当传递时，它会将按钮转换为锚点标签。

description: A special button component that can receive Melt UI builders for use with the asChild prop.
